description: Election Commission - Mr. M. M. Hemachandra of the Weligama Urban Council has Vacated his Office of member of that Urban Council as he has been ceased to be a member of the United National Party - Mr. G. L. Fernando of the Haputale Pradeshiya Sabha has Vacated his Office of the member of the Pradeshiya Sabha as he has been ceased to be a member of the United National Party
